_header: O lord so sweet Sir John doth kiss
_description: Our Sir John, an amorous adventure — five quatrains (abab) and a 2-line burden: ‘Hey noyney I wyll loue oure ser Iohn & I loue eny / hey troly loly hey troly loly’

HunEL34B60.First Lines: O lord so swett ser Iohn dothe kys…
